CustomField.description: If checked, the Forecast process will use Project Assignment Schedule Records (and the Project Assignment BIll/Cost Rates) in the Project Forecasting Process instead of Task Assignment Schedule - e.g. for Forecast Hours, Forecast Revenue etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the Forecast process will use Project Assignment Schedule Records (and the Project Assignment BIll/Cost Rates) in the Project Forecasting Process instead of Task Assignment Schedule - e.g. for Forecast Hours, Forecast Revenue etc.
CustomField.label: Use Project Planned Hour for Forecasting
